title: Distrustful Employee
description: As a facchino working at Xadme's Porter Guild Hall, I maintain a strong professional connection (StrengthScore: 131.25) but harbor significant distrust (TrustScore: -3.37) toward my employer. Despite my considerable wealth (125,493 ducats) as a Popolani, our relationship is strained by the zero wages problem at Xadme's small warehouse, suggesting a pattern of exploitation that undermines our otherwise substantial business relationship.
